text: Paul how credible are these claims as
certainly viewed as credible by the
people who do this for a living when I
first got hold of this document back in
November and I wasn't the only
journalist in Washington to see it I
asked somebody to send a message into
the CIA to see how they viewed it they
couldn't talk to me directly and I got
the message back that there was more
than one tape it was audio as well as
video it was on more than one date and
in more than one location not just this
hotel in Moscow but in some Petersburg
as well and the people dealing with the
file thought it was credible and that's
why it ended up on the President's desk
last week they're credible does not mean
accurate doesn't mean they believe it it
means it's worthy of consideration
reading your piece on the BBC's website
that is like going into a very
complicated spy thriller just how
difficult has it been tracking down
these various sources and will we ever
get to the bottom of this well I suspect
no because if the Russians do have a
blackmail tape they're hardly going to
release it so it comes down to the
credibility of the sources the mi6 man
apparently very well-regarded he spoke
to FSB sources that's the Russian
Security Agency that he regarded as
credible but you have a long chain here
of somebody talking to somebody and at
the end of this chain there either is or
isn't a tape and we simply don't know
that and I think mr. Trump is literally
correct when he says these are
unsubstantiated allegations the
intelligence community says that this
wasn't an intelligence briefing it was
an addendum it was a two-page synopsis
what does that tell you about how they
view this I think they were worried that
this would get out before they had a
chance to put their imprint on it to
frame it in the way they wanted to frame
it as you say it's very much in the vein
of this is what's out there you should
be aware of it but let's not forget at
the heart of this is the idea that the
president-elect of the United States is
vulnerable to blackmail imagine if
that's true there are already senior
Republicans like John McCain talking
about hearings there are Democrats and
it not just wishful thinking on their
part talking about impeachment I think
this is an unprecedented situation in
the history of the Republic it is indeed
Paul would thank you very much for
joining me
